sessions.description:
Saarang is the annual cultural festival of IIT Madras, and one of the top five best college festivals across the country. Over the years, Saarang has remained the preferred platform of an exhibition of culture, talent and competition for students from all over India, from the fields of dance, music, literature and more, all under one roof

For four days in January, IIT Madras is transformed into a hub of activity, with a large number of students, participants, and passers-by who enjoy the amalgam of events, food stalls, workshops and music shows. To the students of the institution and Chennai alike, Saarang is synonymous with culture, colour, fun, learning, and big names, big money, big dreams.

The pool of resources, great judges and opportunity it offers to young talent is a magnetic draw to students, while Chennai localites however, love Saarang for the yearly bonanza of big artistes from all over the world, performing at IIT as part of the professional and World Cultural shows. There is something for absolutely everybody, and we as we at Saarang say, this is truly the next Big Bang- see you at Saarang, for a truly out-of-the-world experience.
sessions.title: Saarang 2016

sessions.description:
One of the largest Classical performances is on it's way this January with a Sarod Concert by the renowned Ustad Amjad Ali Khan and a graceful Bharatnatyam performance by the breath-taking Rukmini Vijayakumar.

Come, witness the legends perform on the star-studded opening act of Saarang 2016, the Classical Night, on 6th January at IIT Madras.
sessions.title: Classical Night - Ustad Amjad Ali Khan and Rukmini Vijayakumar

sessions.description:
TICKETS AT BOOKMYSHOW - SAARANG

Bring the music alive, unleash yourself, dance, dance and dance till you drop. Presenting the biggest inter-collegiate dance competition, Choreo Night Saarang, IIT Madras. #JourneyOfALifetime
sessions.title: Choreo Night

sessions.description:
TICKETS AT BOOKMYSHOW - SAARANG

Saarang's EDM Night presents to you the electro mashup sensation - Djs From Mars as international headliners for 2016. They're bringing the party to India for the very first time, exclusively at Saarang, IIT Madras.

With mashups of popular music from all your favourite artistes, from Adele to Zedd, they have featured consistently in the range of top 100 international DJs. Known for performing with their iconic cardboard box masks, their live shows are packed with pure energy
sessions.title: EDM Night - DJs From MARS

sessions.description:
TICKETS AT BOOKMYSHOW - SAARANG

Saarang's Rock Show presents to you the alternative rock band - Red Jumpsuit Apparatus as headliners for 2016. They are all set to rock India for the very first time as a part of their 'Don't You Fake It 10th Anniversary World Tour' exclusively at Saarang, IIT Madras.

Known for hits such as the acoustic song - 'Your Guardian Angel', classic rock songs such as 'Face Down' and 'False Pretense' which features in the movie 'Never Back Down', they'll be performing their famous Gold Rated debut album in its entirety for the very first time since its release.
sessions.title: Rockshow - The RED JUMPSUIT Apparatus

sessions.description:
TICKETS AT BOOKMYSHOW - SAARANG

Saarang's Popular Night presents to you the hit Bollywood music directing duo - Vishal & Shekhar as headliners for 2016. They are all set to energize Saarang once again with their ever so famous and award winning numbers.

Known for hits in Bollywood compositions, they have won numerous awards for their albums of the hit movies; Anjaana Anjaani, I Hate Love Storys, Jhankaar Beats, Dus, Om Shanti Om, Bachna Ae Haseeno, Dostana, Ra.One, Chennai Express, Bang Bang, Happy New Year and many more, they'll be performing from their large arsenal of reputed albums.
sessions.title: Popular Night - Vishal and Shekhar

sessions.description: We have all dreamt of going up on stage and delivering the performance of our lives. Welcome to monoacting, where narcissism is not a bad thing. The stage is yours, the spotlight is on you, you and you alone will be remembered for that amazing performance you are about to put up! Because a great man once said “There’s nothing more boring than actors talking about acting”, so practice hard, register quick and break a leg!
sessions.title: Mono Acting Prelims

sessions.description: We have all dreamt of going up on stage and delivering the performance of our lives. Welcome to monoacting, where narcissism is not a bad thing. The stage is yours, the spotlight is on you, you and you alone will be remembered for that amazing performance you are about to put up! Because a great man once said “There’s nothing more boring than actors talking about acting”, so practice hard, register quick and break a leg!
sessions.title: Mono Acting Finals

sessions.description:
I like the ephemeral thing about theatre, every performance is like a ghost - it's there and then it's gone.

-Maggie Smith

The Battle Royale of Theatre is back! Our flagship event, this promises to be great fun for both audience and performers alike.  Come, be a part of the magic that is Saarang Dramatics 2016!
sessions.title: Dramatics Finals

sessions.description: Want to vent out those contained emotions? Want to voice out your opinions against the social order? Saarang gives you an enormous floating crowd while you display magnitudes of energy in order to make a change. Start a wave. Come do a street play at Saarang.
sessions.title: Street Play

sessions.description:
Have you been going berserk to let your imagination flow in strokes and scribbles?

Hear Ye Lost Souls!

Saarang Fine Arts 2016 presents:The Sketching Contest (with four mediums)

Sound Familiar? Yep its time to sketch with a dash of color folks! The good old Sketching Contest is back!

But this time the fun’s gonna be much more as you can use any of the 4 different mediums to sketch your imagination.

The mediums are –

  1. Normal Pencils
  2. Charcoal pencils
  3. Coloured pencils
  4. Soft Pastels

So come and show what you are made of at Saarang FineArts 2016 cuz here fun and excellence counts!!
sessions.hashtag: The Sketching Contest( with four mediums)
sessions.title: The Sketching Contest( with four mediums)

sessions.description:
It's time to brand your own art!!

Well painting isn’t just for paper anymore and the most adorable T-shirts are the ones painted!

The T-Shirt Painting workshop is exactly what it sounds like. The idea is to demonstrate creative and innovative techniques to paint designs on T-shirts that will be provided to participants. A professional will be called to instruct you.

Come with your friends to create something beautiful for you to wear at Saarang 2016!
sessions.title: The T-Shirt Painting Workshop

sessions.description:
You can be Joker. You can be Catwoman. Or Just a fierce Tribal!

Oh yes, you can be whoever you want and sail away with a prize. It’s a win-win situation guys, so come and join us at The Face Painting and Tattoo making Contest presented to you by Saarang Fine Arts 2016!

We aren’t on an undercover identity-destruction mission, so we will ensure completely organic and safe paints for your delicate skins!  All you need is lots of enthusiasm and of course a friend who is willing to trust you with their face!

Well it’s the same old event with some additions to it. This time we include tattoo making too. Well it’s time to get inked ;) .
sessions.hashtag: The Face Painting and Tattoo Making Contest
sessions.title: The Face Painting and Tattoo Making Contest
sessions.url: http://saarang.org/2016/main/events/finearts/The Face Painting and Tattoo Making Contest

sessions.description:
Got bored by painting and sketching on paper sheets? Wanna try something new?

Well, let the emptiness of transparency be filled with colours!!

Here it is, the brand new event FineArts Saarang presents to you this year, The glass painting contest. So come and bless those transparent sheets with the shades of rainbow and let them come alive !
sessions.hashtag: Dreams On Glass- The Glass Painting Contest
sessions.title: Dreams On Glass- The Glass Painting Contest
sessions.url: http://saarang.org/2016/main/events/finearts/Dreams On Glass- The Glass Painting Contest

sessions.description:
Classical music and dance have been the proud testimony of India’s rich cultural heritage. We at Saarang, provide you an opportune platform to indulge and enjoy the soul-soothing and awe-inspiring music and dance. Saarang 2016 brings to you four events under the Classical Arts, which are - Vocals (Carnatic and Hindustani), Instrumentals (Percussion), Instrumentals (Non-percussion) and Dance (Classical Solo).

As someone rightly said, “Music speaks that which cannot be said and on which it is impossible to be silent.” And “Dance is the most beautiful expression of your soul’s poetry because it is no mere translation of life, but life itself.”

Come! Let go! Participate and win exciting prizes! And take home beautiful renditions of classic memories!
sessions.title: Solo Dance Prelims

sessions.description:
• Artistes with B-high or higher grades in their respective fields in the AIR are not allowed to participate as this competition is meant for amateurs and semi-professionals.
  • Eligibility: Class 9 and above.
  • Hindustani and Carnatic will be judged together.
  • Electronic instruments are not allowed.
  • The participants will be required to give a list of three talams in which they are prepared to play a thani avarthanam or a solo piece.
  • The judges may ask them to play one more tala from the list provided. Participants may also be required to recite the korvais or other pieces played on judges' demand.
  • Participants may play in Carnatic/Hindustani style. However, they will not be judged separately.
  • Time limit: 6 minutes, though this might change depending on the number of participants. Please stick to the time limit.
  • Any sort of assistance to aid rhythm like music, rhythm clocks etc. are not allowed.
  • We will make available an electronic shruti box. No other instruments will be made available.
  • Judges' decision shall be final in all respects and should be accepted without question.
sessions.title: Instrumentals Percussion

sessions.description: “Raw, pure and sensile blend of voices, percussion, and strings”. Quaint and poignant, LM Unplugged  is here to unleash a whole new world of music, devoid of electronic manipulation. An acoustic light music band event, Unplugged is for the unconventional talents out there. Catapult yourself to a place where there are no distortions or pre-processing. Be it the packed audience, the exciting prizes or the expert judges, for the potpourri of music lovers out there, Unplugged is certainly the place to be.
sessions.title: Unplugged

sessions.description: Saarang gives you a platform to get out there and win hearts with your vocal talent. This solo singing competition in 2 stages pushes you to discover the best in you. Held in one of the best venues on campus, Vox is definitely a great stage for aspiring vocalists to showcase their talent.
sessions.title: Vox Prelims

sessions.description:
Just can’t get enough out of that overpowered vocal engine?

Ever compared your oratory skills to Mark Anthony and come away smiling?

Can your vocal wizardry bring back the dead from their graves?

Can your verbal swagger sway a crowd better than Mick Jagger?

If your answer is a ‘Yes’ to any of the above questions, please do turn up for “Elocution”.
sessions.title: Elocution

sessions.description: Make a mark this Saarang at one of the biggest college band competitions in the country. Fame, glory, fans, and most importantly a celebration of your music - watch it all work on your accord at Powerchords. It's your turn to strike a chord.
sessions.title: Powerchords Prelims

sessions.description:
Latin American Dances!!! Saarang gives you an opportunity to learn dance from the 

masters! And for free!!!! So come along, register, and learn how to dance like you 

always wanted to.
sessions.title: Dance Workshops Salsa

sessions.description:
Sudhir started his stint in music as a beatboxer, but has extended his style since and has innovated a unique technique called fluteboxing, in which he plays the melody from flute and simultaneously beatboxes . He also plays harmonica and other instruments apart from flute. His achievements include reaching the semi-finals of India’s Got Talent and winning numerous accolades from competitions all over South India.


Varun Zinje, AKA Morchangwala, is a jaw harpist from Mumbai. He plays the Morchang, which is an age old musical instrument which has been around for more than 1500 years. It is a predecessor to similar instruments such as harmonica and harmonium. He has a YouTube channel where he has released some of his own compositions using the jaw harp and also has a loyal set of followers. He has performed at various musical shows all over the country and has also given a TedX lecture at Mumbai.


Catch them both in action at Saarang LecDems!
sessions.hashtag: Beatboxer Sudhir and the Morchangwala Zinje
sessions.title: Beatboxer Sudhir and the Morchangwala Zinje

sessions.description: Do you know what Zyzzva is? Do AA, ZA and XI make perfect sense to you? Got vocabulary that will QUIZZIFY your opponent? Then Scrabble at Saarang is just the place for you! Have no clue what those words meant? Fret not, if you can spell, you can play Scrabble. Just grab a partner and come battle it out for Scrabble glory. May the Q be with U!
sessions.title: Scrabble Prelims

sessions.description: Music needs no words. Let your instrument do the talking at Sonata, Saarang’s solo instrumental event. Stimulated by a wonderful atmosphere, this event is a must for those who wish to display their talent at a higher level.
sessions.title: Sonata

sessions.description:
Have you been going berserk to let your imagination flow in strokes and scribbles?

Hear Ye Lost Souls!

Saarang Fine Arts 2016 presents:The Sketching Contest (with four mediums)

  3. Coloured pencils

So come and show what you are made of at Saarang FineArts 2016 cuz here fun and excellence counts!!

sessions.title: The Sketching Contest( with four mediums)

Classical music and dance have been the proud testimony of India’s rich cultural heritage. Come! Let go! Participate and win exciting prizes! And take home beautiful renditions of classic memories!
sessions.title: Vocals Finals

sessions.description: This stage, my dear friend, our very own light music flagship collegiate band hunt, has seen the geniuses of the people that are rocking the Indian music scenario of today, before they made it big. The likes of A.R Rahman, Anirudh Ravichander, Aalap Raju, Karthik and Drums Sivamani is what we're talking about. Now, this is one opportunity you'll certainly regret missing. So, come over then, and fight your way to the spotlight at our magnificent OAT as the opening act to the likes of Sunidhi Chauhan, Sonu Nigam and Shankar-Ehsaan-Loy among other mind-boggling initiatives.
sessions.title: Tarang Prelims

sessions.description: Make a mark this Saarang at one of the biggest college band competitions in the country. Fame, glory, fans, and most importantly a celebration of your music - watch it all work on your accord at Powerchords. It's your turn to strike a chord.
sessions.title: Powerchords Finals

sessions.description: Nothing like a Dance Battle. And nothing like $TREET$ when it comes to B-Boying and Freestyle. $TREET$ is one of the biggest B-Boying and Freestyle events in India. Teams will be judged by the best B-Boys in the world like HAVIKORO, B-Boy GONZA ,B-Boy SPICE and B-Boy CHINO. If you have the moves to make people look on in awe, whether as a team or as an individual, this is the place to be! So join us at this dynamic stage as the voltage is turned high and the stage is charged. Be there!
sessions.title: $treet$

sessions.description:
Latin American Dances!!! Saarang gives you an opportunity to learn dance from the 

masters! And for free!!!! So come along, register, and learn how to dance like you 

always wanted to.
sessions.title: Dance Workshops

sessions.description:
Tania Sachdev is a renowned chess player, who holds the FIDE titles of International Master and Woman Grandmaster. Having started playing chess at the young age of six, she won her first international title at eight. There was no stopping her since, and she has gone on to win numerous titles, and was also conferred the Arjuna Award in 2007. An inspiration to many, she is one of the most distinguished chess players in the country.

Get a chance to pick her brains right at Saarang, IIT Madras!
sessions.title: Tania Sachdev

sessions.description: Terence Lewis is a popular dancer and choreographer, specializing in contemporary dance. He runs his 'Terence Lewis Contemporary Dance Company' in Mumbai, holds dance workshops both in India and abroad. He has choreographed several Bollywood films including Lagaan, Jhankaar Beats and Naach, apart from musicals, stage shows, ads, music videos and dance competitions. Among the nation’s most renowned in the field, Terrence is a must watch for aspiring choreographers and dance enthu people!
sessions.title: Terrence Lewis

sessions.description: You will be asked whether you have heard of a certain sportsperson who is idolised by his fans. But if you haven't heard of him/her, don't worry, nobody is going to deface your Facebook. Add to that questions about black and white movies of then, the special effects of today, the gramophone records of the previous generation and today's SoundCloud generation, and you are going to have one of the most memorable college quizzes of your life.
sessions.title: SpEnt Quiz

sessions.description: Do you consider yourself an anagram virtuoso? Are you more of a walking-talking thesaurus? Or do you generally have a way with words? At Saarang 2015 we present you with the opportunity to prove that you are indeed a master of vocabulary and wordplay. Dazzle us with your stellar word power and saunter away with fabulous prizes.
sessions.title: What's The Good Word Prelims

sessions.description:
The on-spot event consists of two rounds, with the first round being general written round with a word limit and time limit. Second round has 5 prompts out of which you can choose one and start writing your work. There is a word limit and also time limit.

The Saarang On-Spot Creative Writing event takes place as two rounds. There is no pre-registration required.
sessions.title: Onsite Creative Writing

sessions.description: So, you think you can go it alone onstage, be that one person army ( don't want to sound sexist there) and bring the roof down with your vocal prowess? Looking for a spotlight that would shine on you and only you? Stop right there because now you knowwhere you ought to be. Introducing our one and only light music solo singing competition, Alankar, where you can battle it out with over a hundred vocalists while being judged by the best singing talents out there. And then there is always the cash prize and other awesome goodies to look forward to...
sessions.title: Alankar Finals

sessions.description:
The on-spot event consists of two rounds, with the first round being general written round with a word limit and time limit. Second round has 5 prompts out of which you can choose one and start writing your work. There is a word limit and also time limit.

The Saarang On-Spot Creative Writing event takes place as two rounds. There is no pre-registration required.
sessions.title: Onsite Creative Writing

sessions.description: These alliterative accomplices are all you need to set the stage on fire! Get the audience hooked on to every note as in reverberates through the hall with Acoustyx, Saarang's exclusive acoustic band competition; or better - woo the crowd with the magic of pure vocals at our very own Acappella singing event.
sessions.title: Acoustyx

sessions.description: Woo the crowd with the magic of pure vocals at our very own Acappella singing event. Who needs instruments when you've got the power of your mellifluous vocals? Harmonize, sing out loud, clap and snap. Saarang's Acappella singing event is for all those college Acappella groups who have been awaiting their chance to show off their skills. Saarang's Acappella has seen kickass groups from around the country battle it out on the stage with their voices. Don't miss your turn!
sessions.title: Acapella

sessions.description:
Attention Blabbermouths and wannabes,

Are you someone who can save yourself if talking your way out of trouble is the only way out?Can you cook up stories instantly and be the biggest grammar nazi ever at the same time? Do you have an urge to press hard (ahemm,we meant the buzzer) and make your way on to the top?Finally,if you think all it takes is 'Just A Minute' to make the crowd fall in love with with you amidst the endless insults, Saarang JAM is the place to show off.
sessions.title: JAM Finals

sessions.description: Do you know what Zyzzva is? Do AA, ZA and XI make perfect sense to you? Got vocabulary that will QUIZZIFY your opponent? Then Scrabble at Saarang is just the place for you! sessions.description:
Roadshows at Saarang, aims to entertain you with a series of professional performances right on the streets of the beautiful IIT Madras campus, free of cost!

We get the finest performers of the country to keep you entertained. We promise you a wide variety of shows this Saarang! The shows are definitely worth waiting for!

 

Stay tuned...!
sessions.title: Roadshows Team 8e BMX

sessions.title: Roadshows MRF Bike stunt

sessions.description: Do you consider yourself an anagram virtuoso? Are you more of a walking-talking thesaurus? Or do you generally have a way with words? At Saarang 2015 we present you with the opportunity to prove that you are indeed a master of vocabulary and wordplay. Dazzle us with your stellar word power and saunter away with fabulous prizes.
sessions.title: What's The Good Word Finals

sessions.description:
Fancy yourself something of a wordsmith? Do you reach for the Hindu crossword as you have your morning coffee? Do word puzzles always keep you well entertained? Then this is an event you cannot miss. Grab a partner, gulp down your coffee, and show up with your hair in a braid.
 

Saarang Crossie is a word games event which pitches the participants against cryptic crossword clues.  It's a test of wits rather than vocabulary, as opposed to the American (non-cryptic) crosswords.

The clues are not going to be all, say, English made simple (4).

This is the ultimate battle of the cruciverbalists.  Your choice of weapons : a pen, pencil or both.
sessions.title: Crossie Prelims

sessions.description: Do you think you are the kind of person suited to any sport, even completely new and ridiculous ones? Do you think you and your mates can outright beat the teamwork and strategy in a game completely unheard of? Do you miss the times when you did not need electronics in your life and you could make up any game and play with your friends all day long if you had two or three items? If you do, then you should participate in the Street Sports events! Here we make up completely new games where in your quick thinking and teamwork are tested to their ultimatum. Who knows, you might be the next Sachin Tendulkar of one of these sports! Our games provide five minutes of pure fun, laughter and nostalgia to the participants as well as the audience. Awesome goodies await those who are brave enough to test their ability for jugaad!
sessions.id: _informals_streetsports_Football Last man standing, Back heel penalty_
sessions.title: Street Sports Football Last man standing, Back heel penalty

sessions.title: Roadshows MRF Bike Stunt

sessions.description: How adept are you at solving clues? Think you have the mettle to unlock these complex cryptic clues to unravel the mysterious treasure? Then what are you waiting for? Come join the ultimate treasure hunt at Saarang! Be aware. Danger lurks at every corner.
sessions.title: Treasure Hunt

sessions.description: Do you think you are the kind of person suited to any sport, even completely new and ridiculous ones? Do you think you and your mates can outright beat the teamwork and strategy in a game completely unheard of? Do you miss the times when you did not need electronics in your life and you could make up any game and play with your friends all day long if you had two or three items? If you do, then you should participate in the Street Sports events! Here we make up completely new games where in your quick thinking and teamwork are tested to their ultimatum. Who knows, you might be the next Sachin Tendulkar of one of these sports! Our games provide five minutes of pure fun, laughter and nostalgia to the participants as well as the audience. Awesome goodies await those who are brave enough to test their ability for jugaad!
sessions.title: Street Sports Football-Last Man Standing, Backheel Penalty

sessions.description: Think it’s time for your band to be launched into the limelight? Think you have what it takes to compete against some of the best bands in the country? Then waste no time and sign your band up for Saarang Decibels 2016, one of India’s premier competitions for semi-professional bands to make your claim to fame.
sessions.title: Decibels Prelims

sessions.description:
Roadshows at Saarang, aims to entertain you with a series of professional performances right on the streets of the beautiful IIT Madras campus, free of cost!

We get the finest performers of the country to keep you entertained. We promise you a wide variety of shows this Saarang! The shows are definitely worth waiting for!

 

Stay tuned...!

sessions.title: Treasure Hunt

sessions.description: To be announced!!
sessions.title: Speaker 5

sessions.description:
Latin American Dances!!! Saarang gives you an opportunity to learn dance from the 

masters! And for free!!!! So come along, register, and learn how to dance like you 

always wanted to.
sessions.title: Dance Workshops Dance Workshop -4

sessions.description: Want to feel the rush of doing something you’ve never done before? Or the freedom that comes from letting go of all your fears? In other words, if you really want to have fun, then come play laser tag and bungee football and what not at our adventure zone. Also bring your friends, eat popcorn, play FIFA and chill out at our lounge!
sessions.title: Adrenaline Zone

sessions.description:
“Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak”

This year Saarang brings back the most charismatic and glamorous fashion show of the city - “Panache”, which will leave you awestruck and asking for more.

Are you a model trying to make a mark in the fashion industry? Come with your team and be a part of Panache. Be a part of Saarang, and take back with you huge cash prizes, portfolios and something that’s totally invaluable, i.e. experience!
sessions.title: Panache

sessions.description:
Fancy yourself something of a wordsmith? Do you reach for the Hindu crossword as you have your morning coffee? Do word puzzles always keep you well entertained? Then this is an event you cannot miss. Grab a partner, gulp down your coffee, and show up with your hair in a braid.
 

Saarang Crossie is a word games event which pitches the participants against cryptic crossword clues.  It's a test of wits rather than vocabulary, as opposed to the American (non-cryptic) crosswords.

The clues are not going to be all, say, English made simple (4).

This is the ultimate battle of the cruciverbalists.  Your choice of weapons : a pen, pencil or both.
sessions.title: Crossie Finals

sessions.description:
Ever wanted to show your hidden talents to the world and mesmerize audiences with your charisma?

Think you have it in you to be the face of Saarang?

Or are you waiting for the perfect stage?

If you have answered yes to any of the above questions, come off and participate, for there won’t be a stage better than this.

Unleash the talent in you and may the force be with you!
sessions.title: Mr and Ms Saarang

sessions.description:
Freedom is exhilarating. Freedom to dance in your style brings out the best in you. So 

impress us with your bollywood jhatkas or your Jabbawockeeez style or just be yourself. 

Dance like nobody is watching and take the prize away. What other way to throw your 

inhibitions to the air and set your soul free than freestyle? No second thoughts. Just 

dance.
sessions.title: Freestyle Solo

sessions.description:
Roadshows at Saarang, aims to entertain you with a series of professional performances right on the streets of the beautiful IIT Madras campus, free of cost!

We get the finest performers of the country to keep you entertained. We promise you a wide variety of shows this Saarang! The shows are definitely worth waiting for!

 

Stay tuned...!
sessions.title: Roadshows BMX Stunt

sessions.description:
Ever imagined yourself solving cases while watching those varied Sherlocks or when reading those electrifying Agatha and Josephine’s mysteries?

Time to show yourself as we present the much in demand Cluedo this Saarang. We have prepared some lazy puns to terribly exhaustive crime scenes so that you can showcase your reasoning, knowledge and observational skills. Be warned though, for you can never get enough of mysteries once you start thinking about them.
sessions.title: ClueDo Finals

sessions.description: So, you think you can go it alone onstage, be that one person army ( don't want to sound sexist there) and bring the roof down with your vocal prowess? Looking for a spotlight that would shine on you and only you? Stop right there because now you knowwhere you ought to be. Introducing our one and only light music solo singing competition, Alankar, where you can battle it out with over a hundred vocalists while being judged by the best singing talents out there. And then there is always the cash prize and other awesome goodies to look forward to...
sessions.title: Alankar Prelims

sessions.description: So, you think you can go it alone onstage, be that one person army ( don't want to sound sexist there) and bring the roof down with your vocal prowess? Looking for a spotlight that would shine on you and only you? Stop right there because now you knowwhere you ought to be. Introducing our one and only light music solo singing competition, Alankar, where you can battle it out with over a hundred vocalists while being judged by the best singing talents out there. And then there is always the cash prize and other awesome goodies to look forward to...
sessions.title: Alankar Semi Finals

sessions.description: To be announced!!
sessions.title: Speaker 6

sessions.description: Karun Chandhok is part of a very exclusive club of only two Indian Formula 1 drivers and has excelled in various forms of racing. When he's not speeding around the world in fancy cars, he spends his time at home in Kottupuram, Chennai. We are glad he has decided to make the short drive to IIT Madras, to tell us about life in the F1 world and much more at Saarang, 2016!
sessions.title: Karun Chandok

sessions.description: Want to feel the rush of doing something you’ve never done before? Or the freedom that comes from letting go of all your fears? In other words, if you really want to have fun, then come play laser tag and bungee football and what not at our adventure zone. Also bring your friends, eat popcorn, play FIFA and chill out at our lounge!
sessions.title: Adrenaline Zone Laser Tag, Water Zorbing ,Air Rifles, Archery

sessions.description:
A single person quiz. Written prelims, followed by a pre-final round for the top 16 qualifiers, followed by finals for the top 8.

Do you have it in you to survive an entire night of quizzing? Be ready to go up against 

quizzers under the starry skies in the Open Air Theatre of IIT – Madras; be a part of the 

event that crowns the King of college quizzing in India and see if you can be the one who 

walks away with the title at the end of it.

Eligibility for this quiz:

1. Saarang Quizzes are open to full-time students from all disciplines.

2. The quiz is open to students from institutes that are affiliated to universities or are universities themselves.

3. It is NOT open for students from courses run by professional associations such as ICAI, ICSI etc. This list is merely indicative and NOT exhaustive.
sessions.title: Lonewolf Prelims

If you do, then you should participate in the Street Sports events! Here we make up completely new games where in your quick thinking and teamwork are tested to their ultimatum. Who knows, you might be the next Sachin Tendulkar of one of these sports! Our games provide five minutes of pure fun, laughter and nostalgia to the participants as well as the audience. In other words, if you really want to have fun, then come play laser tag and bungee football and what not at our adventure zone. Also bring your friends, eat popcorn, play FIFA and chill out at our lounge!
sessions.title: Adrenaline Zone Air Rifles, Zorbing, Laser Tag, Archery

sessions.description:
Got bored by painting and sketching on paper sheets? Wanna try something new?

Well, let the emptiness of transparency be filled with colours!!

Here it is, the brand new event FineArts Saarang presents to you this year, The glass painting contest. So come and bless those transparent sheets with the shades of rainbow and let them come alive !
sessions.hashtag: Dreams On Glass- The Glass Painting Contest
sessions.title: Dreams On Glass- The Glass Painting Contest
sessions.url: http://saarang.org/2016/main/events/finearts/Dreams On Glass- The Glass Painting Contest

sessions.description:
It's time to brand your own art!!

Well painting isn’t just for paper anymore and the most adorable T-shirts are the ones painted!

The T-Shirt Painting workshop is exactly what it sounds like. The idea is to demonstrate creative and innovative techniques to paint designs on T-shirts that will be provided to participants. A professional will be called to instruct you.

Come with your friends to create something beautiful for you to wear at Saarang 2016!
sessions.title: The T-Shirt Painting Workshop

sessions.description:
ABOUT

Cinema is the most complex and powerful art form in the present world. It can help us to better understand our own lives, the lives of those around us and even how our society and culture operate. They can shed light on political and spiritual matters too and can provide catharsis and perspective and may open our eyes to new ways of thinking, feeling and pursuing our lives. University students are the most important part for the future of India. In all the important stages of our history, students played a vital role. It is through this beauty of ‘man-made’ art, called cinema that we’re able to connect to each other. Here, at Saarang, we wish to relive a dream where you are the creators of a dream world. Let the magic happen!
sessions.title: Short Film Making Saarang Film Festival

sessions.description:
A single person quiz. Written prelims, followed by a pre-final round for the top 16 qualifiers, followed by finals for the top 8.

Do you have it in you to survive an entire night of quizzing? Be ready to go up against 

quizzers under the starry skies in the Open Air Theatre of IIT – Madras; be a part of the 

event that crowns the King of college quizzing in India and see if you can be the one who 

walks away with the title at the end of it.

Eligibility for this quiz:

1. Saarang Quizzes are open to full-time students from all disciplines.

2. The quiz is open to students from institutes that are affiliated to universities or are universities themselves.

3. It is NOT open for students from courses run by professional associations such as ICAI, ICSI etc. This list is merely indicative and NOT exhaustive.
sessions.title: Lonewolf Finals

sessions.description:
Classical music and dance have been the proud testimony of India’s rich cultural heritage. We at Saarang, provide you an opportune platform to indulge and enjoy the soul-soothing and awe-inspiring music and dance. Saarang 2016 brings to you four events under the Classical Arts, which are - Vocals (Carnatic and Hindustani), Instrumentals (Percussion), Instrumentals (Non-percussion) and Dance (Classical Solo).

As someone rightly said, “Music speaks that which cannot be said and on which it is impossible to be silent.” And “Dance is the most beautiful expression of your soul’s poetry because it is no mere translation of life, but life itself.”

Come! Let go! Participate and win exciting prizes! And take home beautiful renditions of classic memories!
sessions.title: Solo Dance Finals

sessions.description: HUMANFOLK is the musical brainchild of well-known guitarist composer Johnny Alegre. This collective is a pioneering effort marking the convergence in a contemporary Philippine setting of multiple musical idioms such as jazz, rock and electronic music. They were conferred with the Awit Award for their hit song Para Sa Tao as Best World Music Recording by the Philippine Association of the Record Industry. With their soothing and rejuvenating music, they are sure to warm the hearts of Saarang audiences.
sessions.title: Humanfolk

sessions.description: Inca Babies are a post-punk rock band from Manchester, England featuring founder member and famous songwriter Harry Stafford on guitars and vocals. For all those death rock lovers out there this is the hallmark.
sessions.title: Inca Babies

sessions.description: This Israeli band combines post-rock, live electronics, psychedelic and groove, forming a powerful, super-intensive musical mix. With broken beats, unique guitar playing, fat bass and fresh synthesized sounds, the fingers integrate the messy intensity of rock music with the ecstasy of electronic raves, creating a thick, unrelenting sound trip.
sessions.title: Tiny Fingers

sessions.description: One of the most successful rappers in Singapore, this famous personality has topped the Singapore R&B charts multiple times. Heard all over the Singaporean radio for his energetic rapping, this is one of the many firsts for Saarang.
sessions.title: Mark Bonafide

sessions.description: It starts off with a few kicks of the football and transforms into show that captures one's imagination. Over the past decade Pawel Skora has mastered, furthered and rewritten every trick in the book. Here freestyle football and music converge to enchant all your senses. It's a show which took Poland by storm and is now fascinating the rest of the world.
sessions.title: Pawel Skora Kicks of Fury - I

sessions.description: The Romanian Indie electro outfit formed in 2005, fuelled by their passion for the fresh, authentic new musical wave coming out of the alternative music scene. The Amsterdams gigs are a burst of energy with their stage dynamics, with the band members constantly switching instruments. Having played in an extensive number of gigs all over Romania and Europe, they are ready to bring their optimism and energy to the World Fest Stage in January.
sessions.title: The Amsterdams

sessions.description: The Indie pop band from Romania, which started off as the individual project of Andrei Hategan in 2011, has gathered some real steam. With the experience of over a 100 concerts all over Romania they are ready to soothe the crowd at Saarang with their jumpy music and charm.
sessions.title: We Singing Colors

sessions.description: One of the most popular bands to come out of Indonesia in recent times, their music thrives under sadness, chaos and melancholia.  Comprising of five long-time friends who met under very different circumstances, they pride themselves on their trademark anthemic melancholic sound, crafting atmospheric songs out of sadness and joy which will surely find an echo in your emotions.
sessions.title: Lightcraft

sessions.description: It starts off with a few kicks of the football and transforms into show that captures one's imagination. Over the past decade Pawel Skora has mastered, furthered and rewritten every trick in the book. Here freestyle football and music converge to enchant all your senses. It's a show which took Poland by storm and is now fascinating the rest of the world.
sessions.title: Pawel Skora Kicks of fury - II

sessions.description: It starts off with a few kicks of the football and transforms into show that captures one's imagination. Over the past decade Pawel Skora has mastered, furthered and rewritten every trick in the book. Here freestyle football and music converge to enchant all your senses. It's a show which took Poland by storm and is now fascinating the rest of the world.
sessions.title: Pawel Skora Free Style Football Workshop

sessions.description: Are you part of an A Capella group that would like to try out some indigenous music? Are you an already established Light Music A Capella group that is looking for a platform to showcase your talents? LM Saarang has its one of a kind, nouvelle vague event, Raagapella, tailored to fit just your needs. Come over, harmonise, clap and snap, and enjoy yourself. There is also a large audience looking forward to your mesmerising harmonies.
sessions.title: Raagapella

sessions.description:
I like the ephemeral thing about theatre, every performance is like a ghost - it's there and then it's gone.

-Maggie Smith

The Battle Royale of Theatre is back! Our flagship event, this promises to be great fun for both audience and performers alike.  Come, be a part of the magic that is Saarang Dramatics 2016!
sessions.title: Dramatics Prelims
